name: Example Bundle v1.0.0
body:
Initial release of the example prompt bundle.

Features:
- Code review assistant
- Bug analyzer
- Refactoring guide

This bundle provides comprehensive prompts for code quality improvements.

name: Testing Bundle v2.1.0
body:
Major update with new testing capabilities.

What's New:
- Unit test generator with edge case coverage
- Test coverage analyzer
- E2E scenario designer
- Improved test templates

Breaking Changes: None

name: Documentation Bundle (Beta)
body:
Beta release for documentation prompts.

Includes:
- API documentation generator
- README template creator
- Comment improver

Note: This is a beta release and may have issues.
